data.message: I have been hacked, I changed password and profile picture and background, they seam to have hacked my account and even pick up my conversations with the people who accepted their friend requests, what else can I do?

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Donna. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2evypVW. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2evCBoN. -Joe
